item.description:
Wake up and head to Northwest Park this morning for the annual Friends of Northwest Park Pancake Breakfast in the Warming Shed. Bring an appetite for a full breakfast of pancakes and sausage smothered in 100% pure maple syrup made right at Windsorâ€™s very own Northwest Park. Refreshment choices include orange juice, coffee, tea and hot chocolate. $5.00 for adults and $3.00 for children under 6.

We'll meet at 9:00 for breakfast and may offer a short walk or hike afterwards (depending on the weather and the state of Gloria's bum knee!)
item.name: Pancake Breakfast
